name: Don't Walk
description:
PLAY WITH THE SOUND ON  and WITH A MOUSE You're put in a room, don't know how you got there, but you have a strange feeling if you take a single step in any direction, you'll die.

(Also includes a bonus mini game mode where you have to throw balls into hoops but you can't move around while doing it)

Game Created for a game jam where the Theme is "Don't Move"

The Game is roughly 12 minutes long in total

I hope you like the game :)
